# particleSystems

**Instance Property**

The particle systems attached to the node.

## Declaration

```swift
var particleSystems: [SCNParticleSystem]? { get }
```

## Discussion

An array of [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem] objects directly attached to the node. This array does not include particle systems attached to the node’s child nodes.

For details on particle systems, see [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem].

## Working with Particle Systems

- **addParticleSystem(_:)**: Attaches a particle system to the node.
- **removeParticleSystem(_:)**: Removes a particle system attached to the node.
- **removeAllParticleSystems()**: Removes any particle systems directly attached to the node.
